name: Milk Tea Talks
description:
A short game about a friend who listens to their friends who are in the middle of a couple fight while drinking Milk Tea. 

4 Endings: 2 Resolution, 2 Separation 
1 Epilogue after getting both Resolution Endings

Credits: 

Writer, Artist, Coder: Ky/Lac at 0alacrity
Background Pictures: Pexels, Edited by 0alacrity
Music:  Eric Matyas, Keys of the Moon, Musmus, Purple Planet Music, Tbone and Friends, Road to Music, Finval, Ternox (All are Royalty Free) 

This was a test project done in between other projects. Thanks for playing! Hope to see you all on the next game.
